_header: My truest treasure so traitorly was taken
Note: Followed by 2794; stanza 5 occurs separately in Rolle’s Meditations on the Passion: see 1524.
_description: A song of the Passion — seven quatrains

CULDd564.First Lines:
My trewest tresowre sa trayturly was takenSa bytterly bondyn wyth
                    bytand bandesHow sone of þi seruandes was þu forsakenand
                    lathly for my lufe hurld with þair handes…
CULDd564.Last Lines:
…Bot wynd vp my wylle to won wyth þe ayþat þu
                    be berys in my brest & bryng me to blysse
